2.1.1.name: wordpress/facebook-like-omgubuntu-style
2.1.1.description:
Are you tired of finding the the plugin that omgubuntu.co.uk use? Now you should find the right one here.

Please note that you cannot install if your hosting do not support fopen php plugin. It will be crash on widget selection page.

Actually doing the widget in manual mode is more easier than developing the widget/plugin as i required to know much in programming. But, after 2 days i have come with this widget to all of you use it for free.

For 2.1.1 and below, please read

sory guys. I never use svn before. And my plugin is not compatible with svn. Now i have rename it to work. Delete your old 2.1.1 and below plugin and install this one. Hope u guys enjoy it.

I have some time to code this things and this is the result. Hope all of you enjoy it in your wordpress. And the CSS is not from me. I take it from omgubuntu site.
